name: TwilioCall

metadata.description:
TwillioCall


The provided message will be read to the recipient 2 times by a female voice.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • response (only returned on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • to: The recipiants phone number
  • from: The callers phone number
  • message: The message that will be read
  • TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID: The account sid for your twillio account
  • TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN: The auth token for your twillio account (we do not recommend to fill in the auth token as plaintext, use declerative binding in combination with vault)
